Now, after fixing all those issues, the search finally worked. The response from the tool gives the details of the Golden Gate Bridge. The user probably wants the location, so I should present the address and maybe the coordinates. Let me check the data.

The Golden Gate Bridge is located at:  
**Golden Gate Bridge, Golden Gate Brg, San Francisco, CA**  
Coordinates: **37.8199° N, 122.4786° W**  

It’s an iconic suspension bridge spanning the Golden Gate Strait, connecting San Francisco to Marin County. For more details, visit [goldengate.org](https://www.goldengate.org/) or call +1 (415) 921-5858. 🌉
